name: TDC
overview:
TDC is a provider of communications solutions in Denmark and a strong player in the Nordic business market. They have developed from a traditional provider of landline and mobile services into a provider of modern communications solutions.

In all key markets in Denmark, they will continue to innovate, and it is their goal to be the most efficient telecom operator in the Nordic region, providing the best coherent services on all terminals and networks, anytime, anywhere.
